summary: Contoso Wireless offers three levels of streaming services: Basic, Standard, and Premium. Basic offers access to the standard library of content in up to 480p resolution, Standard includes some premium content in up to 720p resolution, and Premium includes access to the entire library in 1080p resolution. Customers can downgrade their service at any time by selecting a lower tier in their account settings. There may also be promotional discounts and loyalty rewards available for customers.
